title: Find [p2p] GoodPeers intermittently on Goerli
body:
Hi, I've been using erigon for a couple of months to have a full archive node of Ethereum and Goerli. Ethereum works without problems, on Goerli, as time goes on, I noticed that my node is no longer able to find peers. It finds about 1/2 of them every 10/12 hours at each restart of erigon service, and then loses them after a while losing node sync.

Erigon v2.49.2

before the reboot

[INFO] [09-19|10:05:38.953] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth68=5 eth67=1
[INFO] [09-19|10:05:40.289] [5/7 Execution] Completed on             block=9721838
[INFO] [09-19|10:05:44.927] [txpool] stat                            pending=6148 baseFee=0 queued=15215 alloc=1.6GB sys=4.2GB
..................................

after the reboot

[INFO] [09-20|15:29:57.345] [p2p] GoodPeers
[INFO] [09-20|15:30:03.304] [txpool] stat                            pending=0 baseFee=0 queued=0 alloc=1.1GB sys=1.5GB
[TRACE] [09-20|16:00:22.430] Starting p2p dial                        id=c5686f5448f68a14776f4aa55a7d36320fa6d5362628aac9a4a8686b785f466e ip=194.33.40.233 flag=dyndial
[TRACE] [09-20|16:00:22.430] DNS discovery lookup                     name=BQMWYIBRYEOG3SYEQMG5QRY5TI.all.goerli.ethdisco.net err=nil
[TRACE] [09-20|16:00:22.430] DNS discovery lookup                     name=E2CTPOLH3KHJXLNHWP5NUUMVBI.all.goerli.ethdisco.net err=nil
[TRACE] [09-20|16:00:22.433] Failed p2p handshake                     id=14c88419198d51b17c87324e0f423e039e848e8f0d073b48adf5b7fc6fe57f4d addr=44.200.161.147:30303 conn=dyndial err="too many peers"
[TRACE] [09-20|16:00:22.463] Failed RLPx handshake                    addr=173.212.222.167:30303 conn=dyndial err=EOF
[TRACE] [09-20|16:00:22.601] Failed p2p handshake                     id=e52c69ad56be4abd128d0886d362a3c180e85afefc13d3d462395dac7b16e6f1 addr=98.67.161.140:30304 conn=dyndial err="too many peers"
[TRACE] [09-20|16:00:22.624] Failed p2p handshake                     id=793f0278aa80b538cd925411f6369f6104d70e9fec656bffe7f1f6f96f007755 addr=217.76.58.181:30303 conn=dyndial err="too many peers"
[TRACE] [09-20|16:00:22.672] Failed RLPx handshake                    addr=194.33.40.233:30306 conn=dyndial err=EOF
[TRACE] [09-20|16:00:22.879] Removed dead node                        b=16 id=9d9171ce13a930ed62e206585dfe3772ceb73531357c3c747b6999cf59a59533 ip=18.218.250.66 checks=0
[TRACE] [09-20|16:00:22.884] Removed dead node                        b=16 id=dc01bcba00a26ab370738839dc484e89cd09692b543c61322293913df4637c1f ip=3.11.147.67 checks=0

What could be the problem?
